snippet: The chance to add new drilling sites in the Gulf of Mexico is a milestone in the company’s recovery from the Deepwater Horizon disaster.
abstract: Federal government is to auction off rights to new oil drilling sites, first since BP and Environmental Protection Agency reached settlement that lifts ban that prevented company from pursuing new leases and other government contracts; chance to add new drilling sites in Gulf of Mexico is milestone in company’s recovery from Deepwater Horizon disaster.

byline.original: By CLIFFORD KRAUSS and STANLEY REED
byline.contributor: Clifford Krauss reported from Houston and Stanley Reed from London.

lead_paragraph: The chance to add new drilling sites in the Gulf of Mexico is a milestone in the company’s recovery from the Deepwater Horizon disaster.

headline.main: End of Gulf Ban Allows BP to Expand in Familiar, Lucrative Territory
headline.print_headline: End of Gulf Ban Allows BP to Expand in Familiar, Lucrative Territory
